tool_description: Get a list of synonyms from a french word
title: French Synonyms

api_list.name: Get Synonyms
api_list.description: Get all synonyms from a word
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://french-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com/{word}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "french-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
